Here's how to get Rehearse up and running in Eclipse:

1. Download the latest revision and import the following directories as Eclipse projects.  They can be found under rehearse/rehearse-processing/trunk.
  * build
  * core
  * dxf
  * net
  * opengl
  * pdf
  * app (processing)
  * serial
  * video

2. Add all of the above directories to the "processing" classpath.  To do this, right-click on "processing" in the Package Explorer and select "Properties".  Under "Java Build Path" make sure the checkboxes next to all the above projects are checked.

3. To run Rehearse, run the following file as a Java application:
  processing/src/edu/stanford/hci/processing/RehearseBase.java
